noCrashOnMixin2(5,15): error TS1005: ';' expected.
noCrashOnMixin2(9,16): error TS1128: Declaration or statement expected.
noCrashOnMixin2(9,16): error TS1005: '{' expected.
noCrashOnMixin2(9,16): error TS1005: '}' expected.

==== noCrashOnMixin2 (4 errors) ====
    
    // https://github.com/microsoft/TypeScript/issues/62921
    
    class Abstract {
        protected constructor() {
                  ~~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS1005: ';' expected.
        }
    }
    
    class Concrete extends Abstract {
                   ~~~~~~~
!!! error TS1128: Declaration or statement expected.
                   ~~~~~~~
!!! error TS1005: '{' expected.
                   ~~~~~~~
!!! error TS1005: '}' expected.
    }
    
    type Constructor<T = {}> = new (...args?: any[]) => T;
    
    function Mixin<TBase extends Constructor>(Base: TBase) {
        return class extends Base {
        };
    }
    
    class Empty {
    }
    
    class CrashTrigger extends Mixin(Empty) {
        public trigger() {
            new Concrete();
        }
    }
